title: NATIVE IMPORT FROM ROYALTS
author: spitty78
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
Native import from RoyalTS.  All my connections are in RoyalTS and it'll be a pain to manually set them all up in mRemoteNG which is a superior RDP Manager.

iterations.description: Feature request to add native import support for RoyalTS XML connection files, which store connections in a well-documented XML format with decrypted credentials

comments.author: jumoog
comments.snippet: RoyalTS store all connections in a XML file. The password is always decrypted in "CredentialPassword"

comments.author: spitty78
comments.snippet: What are the locations in Windows?  I can't seem to locate the .xml file.

notes:
AI triage: Feature request to add native import support for RoyalTS XML connection files, which store connections in a well-documented XML format with decrypted credentials
Approach: Create a new RoyalTSImporter class that parses RoyalTS XML files and maps their connection properties (host, port, protocol, credentials) to mRemoteNG ConnectionInfo objects, then register it in the import dialog
